member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS
member.summary: Holds an extra data block used by . It holds console properties.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.dbh
member.summary: The structure with the NT_CONSOLE_PROPS structure's size and signature. The signature for an NT_CONSOLE_PROPS structure is NT_CONSOLE_PROPS_SIG.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.wFillAttribute
member.summary: Fill attribute for the console.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.wPopupFillAttribute
member.summary: Fill attribute for console pop-ups.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.dwScreenBufferSize
member.summary: A COORD structure with the console's screen buffer size.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.dwWindowSize
member.summary: A COORD structure with the console's window size.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.dwWindowOrigin
member.summary: A COORD structure with the console's window origin.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.nFont
member.summary: The font.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.nInputBufferSize
member.summary: The input buffer size.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.dwFontSize
member.summary: A COORD structure with the font size.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.uFontFamily
member.summary: The font family.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.uFontWeight
member.summary: The font weight.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.FaceName
member.summary: A character array that contains the font's face name.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.uCursorSize
member.summary: The cursor size.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.bFullScreen
member.summary: A boolean value that is set to TRUE if the console is in full-screen mode, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.bQuickEdit
member.summary: A boolean value that is set to TRUE if the console is in quick-edit mode, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.bInsertMode
member.summary: A boolean value that is set to TRUE if the console is in insert mode, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.bAutoPosition
member.summary: A boolean value that is set to TRUE if the console is in auto-position mode, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.uHistoryBufferSize
member.summary: The size of the history buffer.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.uNumberOfHistoryBuffers
member.summary: The number of history buffers.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.bHistoryNoDup
member.summary: A boolean value that is set to TRUE if old duplicate history lists should be discarded, or FALSE otherwise.

member.name: NT_CONSOLE_PROPS.ColorTable
member.summary: An array of COLORREF values with the console's color settings.
